title: Shooting Better Home Videos
brief_description: Australian film director, Maurice Murphy takes you through a sixty minute demonstration of how best to use your video camera. Basic techniques are explained as well as ways to experiment and produce more interesting effects. The video is divided into eight sections:- Basic shots; Experiment; Birthday party; A day in the country; City scenes and light; Sports action; The wedding; Improving your techniques.
